data.title: Home
data.meta_description: HQ in California, office in Phoenix, AZ. Managed Hosting solutions which span across technologies from legacy to emerging. IBM Cloud and Fujitsu server, M10 M4
data.text:
Hitachi Vantara: We Help You Unlock the Full Value of Your Data Data is your competitive edge. But for many it is becoming less accessible as it becomes more dense, diverse and distributed. Are your people, processes and technology able to fully manage, enrich and transform it to consistently deliver insights throughout your enterprise? If not, we can help. Get your advantage today with Hitachi Vantara. Hitachi Vantara delivers:

• 100% Availability Guarantee for VSP block storage arrays

• Industry-leading performance with latency below 40 microseconds for VSP block arrays

• On-prem cloud storage with flexible, microservices-based HCP Cloud Scale object storage

• The world's fastest filesystem with Hitachi Content Software for File (HCSF), our partnership with Weka.io

• Video analytics, camera, and LIDAR solutions for law enforcement, retail, and public spaces Hitachi Vantara, a wholly owned subsidiary of Hitachi, Ltd., guides our customers from what's now to what's next by solving their digital challenges. Working alongside each customer, we apply our unmatched industrial and digital capabilities to their data and applications to benefit both business and society. More than 80 percent of Fortune 100 companies trust Hitachi Vantara to help them develop new revenue streams, unlock competitive advantages, lower costs, enhance customer experiences, and deliver social and environmental value.
